body.p: “I see squirrel-tracks about the hemlocks. They are much like rabbits “,” only the toes are very distinct. From this they pass into a semicircular figure sometimes. Some of the first are six inches from outside to outside lengthwise “,” with one to two feet of interval.”
PE 10, pg. 136 / 4 January-23 April 1856 / NNPM MA 1302:26 / T vol. # XX / PDF # XIV / JVIII
